description: Dual paths of impenetrable defense (Aegis) and calculated strikes (Artifice).

abilities.name: Metal Plating
abilities.effect: Gain a temporary shield that absorbs up to 10 physical damage.

abilities.name: Reinforce
abilities.effect: As a bonus action, grant an adjacent ally a +1 bonus to their Damage Reduction for 1 round.

abilities.name: Guardian Stance
abilities.effect: As a major action, you brace yourself, gaining a +2 bonus to your defensive rolls for one round.

abilities.name: Intercede
abilities.effect: As a reaction when an enemy attacks an ally who is within 5 feet of you, you can move between them and declare yourself the new target of the attack.

abilities.name: Aegis Protocol
abilities.effect: When an ally is hit by an attack that deals elemental damage, you can grant them resistance to that damage type for that one attack.

abilities.name: Crystalline Scales
abilities.effect: As a bonus action, you can harden your skin with crystalline scales. Ranged attacks against you have a -2 penalty for 1 round.

abilities.name: Steel Skin
abilities.effect: Gain resistance to all physical damage for 1 round.

abilities.name: Resonant Field
abilities.effect: Create a 15-foot radius field that lasts for 3 rounds. Allies inside gain +2 to their Damage Reduction.

abilities.name: Guardian's Echo
abilities.effect: Once per combat, when an ally within 10 feet is hit by an attack, you can use your Reaction to take half of the damage for them.

abilities.name: Adamant Plating
abilities.effect: Your chassis is exceptionally durable. You gain a permanent +1 bonus to your Damage Reduction.

abilities.name: Unbreakable Stance
abilities.effect: You gain a permanent +2 bonus to any check to resist being pushed, moved, or knocked prone.

abilities.name: Seismic Plating
abilities.effect: As a reaction when hit by an attack, you can absorb the impact. The attacker must make an Agility DC 14 check or be knocked prone.

abilities.name: Bulwark Aura
abilities.effect: You project a 15-foot aura of defensive energy for 3 rounds. Any ranged attack that passes into or out of the aura has a -2 penalty to the attack roll.

abilities.name: Kinetic Redirection
abilities.effect: When you are hit by a melee attack, you can use your Reaction to absorb part of the blow. Your next successful melee attack deals an additional 1d10 physical damage and the target must make a Might DC 13 check or be knocked prone.

abilities.name: Unbreakable Form
abilities.effect: As a major action, you can harden your body. For 3 rounds, you are immune to being moved and all physical damage you take is reduced by half.

abilities.name: Final Guard
abilities.effect: Once per day, when an attack would reduce you to 0 Vitality, you can use your Reaction to be reduced to 1 Vitality instead.

abilities.name: Juggernaut Form
abilities.effect: Temporarily grow in size, gaining immunity to effects that would move you, a +4 bonus to your Damage Reduction, and Advantage on all Might checks for 3 rounds.

abilities.name: Resonant Pulse
abilities.effect: As a major action, you release a wave of concussive energy. All enemies in a 20-foot radius take 3d8 thunder damage and must make a Might DC 16 check or be knocked prone.

abilities.name: The Perfect Machine
abilities.effect: For 3 rounds, you are immune to all non-magical damage and cannot be moved or targeted by mind-altering effects. Adjacent allies gain a +2 bonus to their Damage Reduction. Usable once per day.

abilities.name: Immovable Object
abilities.effect: You transform into a mountain of pure metal. For 1 minute, your size becomes Large, you gain Damage Reduction 15, and you are immune to being moved. All allies within 30 feet gain cover from ranged attacks.

abilities.name: Geared Strike
abilities.effect: Hurl a shrapnel shard at a single target, dealing 1d10 physical damage. This attack ignores 1 point of the target's Damage Reduction.

abilities.name: Pressure Vent
abilities.effect: As a bonus action after a successful attack, you can release a cloud of hot steam. The target must make a Might DC 12 check or have a -1 penalty on their next roll.

abilities.name: Arcane Barrage
abilities.effect: As a major action, fire a barrage of three small energy bolts. Each bolt can target a different enemy or the same one, and each bolt deals 1d8 arcane damage.

abilities.name: Resonant Strike
abilities.effect: As a major action, you make a melee attack. On a hit, the target takes an additional 1d8 sonic damage and is Deafened for 1 round.

abilities.name: Overcharge
abilities.effect: As a bonus action, you can overcharge a single ally's weapon with arcane energy, granting them a +1 bonus to their next damage roll.

abilities.name: Calibrated Shot
abilities.effect: You can use a bonus action to analyze a target's weak points. Your next ranged attack against that target has a +2 bonus to the attack roll.

abilities.name: Wrecking Ball
abilities.effect: Hurl a heavy, chain-linked sphere at a target, dealing 2d8 physical damage and forcing a Might DC 13 check to avoid being knocked prone.

abilities.name: Focused Blast
abilities.effect: You can take a major action to fire a beam of energy at a single target, dealing 2d10 arcane damage. This ignores the target's Damage Reduction.

abilities.name: Arcane Sentry
abilities.effect: As a bonus action, deploy a small, hovering magical turret that lasts for 3 rounds. The sentry automatically fires a bolt of arcane energy at the nearest enemy at the start of your turn, dealing 1d10 arcane damage.

abilities.name: Sunder Armor
abilities.effect: When you hit a target with an attack, their Damage Reduction is reduced by 2 for 1 round.

abilities.name: Harpoon Launcher
abilities.effect: Your arm transforms into a launcher that fires a tethered harpoon. On a successful hit, the target takes 1d6 damage and must make a Might DC 14 check or become 'Restrained'.

abilities.name: Shattering Punch
abilities.effect: Make a single, devastating melee attack that ignores all of the target's non-magical Damage Reduction.

abilities.name: System Shock
abilities.effect: You overload a target's senses with a burst of arcane energy. The target takes 3d10 lightning damage and must make a Mind DC 16 check or be Stunned for 1 round.

abilities.name: Volatile Vent
abilities.effect: As a major action, you vent raw energy from your core. You take 1d6 irreducible damage, and all enemies within a 10-foot radius take 3d8 necrotic damage.

abilities.name: Overcharge Shot (Modifies Arc-Cannon)
abilities.effect: You learn to dangerously overcharge the Arc-Cannon. When you attack with this configuration, you can choose to take a -2 penalty to the attack roll. If the attack hits, the target has disadvantage on its next action.

abilities.name: Anomaly
abilities.effect: As a major action, you target a point on the battlefield. All enemies within a 15-foot radius must make a Mind DC 16 check or be Confused for 1 round.

abilities.name: Concussive Force (Modifies Seismic Gauntlet)
abilities.effect: The damage of your 'Seismic Gauntlet' increases from 2d6 to 3d6, and enemies hit by it are now pushed back 10 feet in addition to the prone check. This requires the Seismic Gauntlet configuration to be unlocked.

abilities.name: Forge-Heart Overload
abilities.effect: You can overclock your systems to fire a devastating blast. As a major action, make an attack roll with Advantage. On a hit, the attack deals an additional 5d10 fire damage.

abilities.name: Annihilation Protocol
abilities.effect: You unleash a torrent of devastating force. Deals 6d12 physical damage to a single target. All of its abilities are considered to be on cooldown for 1 round.

abilities.name: System Override
abilities.effect: As a major action, you can attempt to hack a single construct or golem within 60 feet. The target must make a Mind DC 18 check or become a temporary ally for 3 rounds, following your commands.
